confirm_otp.title: Enter your verification code
confirm_otp.enter_otp: Your code has been sent to XXX XXX X849

take_a_selfie.title: Take a selfie
take_a_selfie.description: Take a selfie to activate your account
take_a_selfie.tip1: Remove any head covering, e.g. glasses, hats

face_scanning.title: Face scanning
face_scanning.description:
Position your face within the frame 
and ensure optimal lighting conditions.

post_activation.success_description: You can securely access your MULA Biz account by using your personal password.

terms_and_conditions.title: Terms & Conditions
terms_and_conditions.description: Mula-X is permitted to revise these Terms at any time as it sees fit, and by using this Website you are expected to review such Terms on a regular basis to ensure you understand all terms and conditions governing use of this Website.
terms_and_conditions.restriction_description: You are expressly and emphatically restricted from all of the following:

validators.field_empty: This field must not be empty
validators.password_error: At least 1 small letter, 1 capital letter, 1 number and 1 symbol, 8-30 characters
validators.make_password_match: Please make sure both passwords match
validators.mobile_number_error: Must start with 0 or +66, should be longer than 8 and shorter than 13 characters
validators.pin_not_match: PIN and Reentered PIN do not match. Please try again.

reset_password.title: Reset password
reset_password.description: Password must be different from last 3 passwords

name: Name
doYouConfirmDeleteThisUser: Do you confirm to deactivate this user?
addByClickingTheIconInTheRightCorner: Add by clicking the icon in the right corner
yourCodeHasBeenSentTo: Your code has been sent to
theCodeIsOnlyValidFor: The code is only valid for
youCanResetYourPasswordByVerifyingYourId:
You can reset your password by 
verifying your identity
youCanResetYourPinByVerifyingYourIdentit:
You can reset your PIN by 
verifying your identity
retriction1: • publishing any website material in any media;
retriction2: • publicly performing and/or showing any application material;
retriction3: • using this application in any way that is, or may be, damaging to this application
retriction4: • engaging in any data mining, data harvesting, data extracting or any other similar activity in relation to this Website, or while using this Website;
retriction5: • using this Website to engage in any advertising or marketing;
iAcknowledgeAndAcceptTheMULAApp: I acknowledge and accept the MULA app
noOutstandingBillForThisAccount: No outstanding bill for this account
placeQRCodeInTheMiddleOfFocusArea: Place QR code in the middle of focus area
